```{r}
test_that("eq_location_clean returns a data table", {
  expect_equal(class(dat), c("tbl_df","tbl", "data.frame"))
})

```

```{r}
dat[1, ]$LOCATION_NAME
```
```{r}
test_that("eq_location_clean converts LATITUDE and LONGITUDE to numeric", {
  expect_equal(class(dat$LATITUDE), "numeric")
  expect_equal(class(dat$LONGITUDE), "numeric")
})
```
